title.narrative: Kolkata Environmental Improvement Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: Tranche 2 will continue improvements in coverage and operational sustainability of Kolkata Municipal Corporation's sewerage, drainage, and water supply services. The accompanying TA will strengthen climate resilience of Kolkata through improved planning and disaster risk management.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2021, additional five pumping stations and 6 km of pumping mains constructed
